modifiers.name: Fury
modifiers.description: Behemoth rage lasts longer, and empowers the Behemoth's defense and attack.

modifiers.name: Jagged
modifiers.description: Attacks that would cause wound now cause crippling wound.

modifiers.name: Tough Hide
modifiers.description: Behemoth parts take less damage, but wounded parts take much more damage.

modifiers.name: Icy Grave
modifiers.description: When Slayers are frozen, a deadly trap starts to spring.
